review_data.title: Very cosy place
review_data.content: A nice place to wait for the performance right at the opera house. The service was very friendly. There are nice tables with old-fashioned decor. However, all of them were reserved for later.

review_data.title: Wenn es eilt
review_data.content: Für Kaffee oder Schnellimbiss geeignet. Vor Theatervorstellungen sind freie Plätze eher Zufall. Verpflegungsangebot befriedigend. Service eher hektisch.More

review_data.title: Nice place to stop during lakeside walk
review_data.content: In the shadow of the Opera House this was a nice place to stop for coffee and cakes during our lakeside walk Service was friendly and efficient

review_data.title: best flammekueche in years....
review_data.content: It looks very swiss from the outside but they serve the best fresh and creamy Alsacian flammekueche I had in a long time.Kind and professional service. Menu's available in diffferent language. Perfect pitstop for your walk around the lake and the old city....

review_data.title: Friendly café overlooking Sechselautenplatz
review_data.content: Bernhard BarCafe is located in the shared building for the Bernhard Theatre and next to the Opera house. The cafe has an interesting assortment of seating arraignments from wooden theatre seats, tables, chairs and antique padded sofas and chairs. They also have a nice patio...More

review_data.title: A drink before returning home
review_data.content: Nice and friendly staff. Warm and cosy bar. Light snacks. The Flammkuchen are tasty and not expensive. Good to share. Recommended 😀
